alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:02PM EDT until September 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Passaic County in northeastern New Jersey... Orange County in southeastern New York... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 702 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Haven to Highland Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Middletown and Warwick around 705 PM EDT. Florida around 710 PM EDT. Goshen and Greenwood Lake around 715 PM EDT. Chester around 725 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
